author: Liang, YM
adress: Hunan Normal Univ, Affiliated Hosp 1, Hunan Prov Peoples Hosp, Dept Nephrol, Changsha, Hunan, Peoples R China
title: 1,25-Dihydroxyvitamin D3 Prevents Epithelial-Mesenchymal Transition of HMrSV5 Human Peritoneal Mesothelial Cells by Inhibiting Histone Deacetylase 3 (HDAC3) and Increasing Vitamin D Receptor (VDR) Expression Through the Wnt/beta-Catenin Signaling Pathway
